verses.verse: Now these <WH2063> are the commandments, <WH4687> the statutes, <WH2706> and the judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> to teach <WH3925> you, that you might do <WH6213> them in the land <WH776> where <WH834> <WH8033> you go <WH5674> to possess <WH3423> it:

That you might fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> to keep <WH8104> all <WH3605> his statutes <WH2708> and his commandments, <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you, you, and your son, <WH1121> and your son's <WH1121> son, <WH1121> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of your life; <WH2416> and that your days <WH3117> may be prolonged. <WH748>

Hear <WH8085> therefore, O Israel, <WH3478> and observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> it; that it may be well <WH3190> with you, and that you may increase <WH7235> mightily, <WH3966> as the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> has promised <WH1696> you, in the land <WH776> that flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>
Hear, <WH8085> O Israel: <WH3478> The LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> is one <WH259> LORD: <WH3068>
And you shall love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> with all <WH3605> your heart, <WH3824> and with all <WH3605> your soul, <WH5315> and with all <WH3605> your might. <WH3966>
And these <WH428> words, <WH1697> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day, <WH3117> shall be in your heart: <WH3824>

And you shall teach <WH8150> them diligently <WH8150> to your children, <WH1121> and shall talk <WH1696> of them when you sit <WH3427> in your house, <WH1004> and when you walk <WH3212> by the way, <WH1870> and when you lie <WH7901> down, <WH7901> and when you rise <WH6965> up.
And you shall bind <WH7194> them for a sign <WH226> on your hand, <WH3027> and they shall be as frontlets <WH2903> between <WH996> your eyes. <WH5869>
And you shall write <WH3789> them on the posts <WH4201> of your house, <WH1004> and on <WH5921> your gates. <WH8179>

And it shall be, when <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall have brought <WH935> you into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to your fathers, <WH1> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob, <WH3290> to give <WH5414> you great <WH1419> and goodly <WH2896> cities, <WH5892> which <WH834> you built <WH1129> not,

And houses <WH1004> full <WH4392> of all <WH3605> good <WH2898> things, which <WH834> you filled <WH4390> not, and wells <WH953> dig, <WH2672> which <WH834> you digged <WH2672> not, vineyards <WH3754> and olive <WH2132> trees, which <WH834> you planted <WH5193> not; when you shall have eaten <WH398> and be full; <WH7646>

Then beware <WH8104> lest <WH6435> you forget <WH7911> the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> brought <WH3318> you forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> from the house <WH1004> of bondage. <WH5650>
You shall fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and serve <WH5647> him, and shall swear <WH7650> by his name. <WH8034>
You shall not go <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> of the gods <WH430> of the people <WH5971> which <WH834> are round <WH5439> about you;

(For the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> is a jealous <WH7067> God <WH410> among <WH7130> you) lest <WH6435> the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> be kindled <WH2734> against you, and destroy <WH8045> you from off <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth. <WH127>
You shall not tempt <WH5254> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> as you tempted <WH5254> him in Massah. <WH4532>

You shall diligently keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and his testimonies, <WH5713> and his statutes, <WH2706> which <WH834> he has commanded <WH6680> you.

And you shall do <WH6213> that which <WH834> is right <WH3477> and good <WH2896> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD: <WH3068> that it may be well <WH3190> with you, and that you may go <WH935> in and possess <WH3423> the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers. <WH1>
To cast <WH1920> out all <WH3605> your enemies <WH341> from before <WH6440> you, as the LORD <WH3068> has spoken. <WH1696>

And when <WH3588> your son <WH1121> asks <WH7592> you in time <WH4279> to come, <WH4279> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> mean the testimonies, <WH5713> and the statutes, <WH2706> and the judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> has commanded <WH6680> you?

Then you shall say <WH559> to your son, <WH1121> We were Pharaoh's <WH6547> slaves <WH5650> in Egypt; <WH4714> and the LORD <WH3068> brought <WH3318> us out of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand: <WH3027>

And the LORD <WH3068> showed <WH5414> signs <WH226> and wonders, <WH4159> great <WH1419> and sore, <WH7451> on Egypt, <WH4714> on Pharaoh, <WH6547> and on all <WH3605> his household, <WH1004> before our eyes: <WH5869>
And he brought <WH3318> us out from there, <WH8033> that he might bring <WH935> us in, to give <WH5414> us the land <WH776> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to our fathers. <WH1>

And the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> us to do <WH6213> all <WH3605> these <WH428> statutes, <WH2706> to fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> for our good <WH2896> always, <WH3605> <WH3117> that he might preserve <WH2421> us alive, <WH2421> as it is at this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And it shall be our righteousness, <WH6666> if <WH3588> we observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all <WH3605> these <WH2063> commandments <WH4687> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> as he has commanded <WH6680> us.
